subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I have walked dreams before, but I suspect this will be much harder. Finding a culprit amidst mystery, they will try to hide themselves from me.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I will need to start performing the ritual.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I must find a way to make these stars align along my crystals.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Try to so slingshot these colored stars toward their matching crystals. Twelve will allow me to enter the dream realm where I may find answers.
